ADDI: 27bdffe0 - 001001 -> ADDI   , 11101 -> rs (29 =  SP), 11101 -> rt (29 = SP), 1111 1111 1110 0000 -> imm (65504)
JR	: 03e00008 - 000000 -> SPECIAL, 11111 -> rs (31 = R31), 00 0000 0000, 00000 -> HINT, 001000 -> JR

JALR: 
BLTZ: 
J	: 
DIV : 
BNE	:

LW  :
SW  :
 
ADDI: 24210008 - 001001 -> ADDI, 00001 -> rs (1  =  R1), 00001 -> rt (1  = R1), 0000 0000 0000 1000 -> imm (8)
ADDI: 24420009 - 001001 -> ADDI, 00010 -> rs (2  =  R2), 00010 -> rt (2  = R2), 0000 0000 0000 1001 -> imm (9)
SLT	: 0022182A - 000000 -> SPECIAL, 00001 -> rs (1  =  R1), 00010 -> rt (2  =  R2), 00011 -> rd (3  =  R3), 00000, 101010 -> SLT
// rd ← (rs < rt) --> should return true as rs(8) < rt(9)


ADDI: 24210008 - 001001 -> ADDI, 00001 -> rs (1  =  R1), 00001 -> rt (1  = R1), 0000 0000 0000 1000 -> imm (8)
ADDI: 24420009 - 001001 -> ADDI, 00010 -> rs (2  =  R2), 00010 -> rt (2  = R2), 0000 0000 0000 1001 -> imm (9)
BEQ	: 102200FA - 000100 -> BEQ, 00001 -> rs, 00010 -> rt, 0000 0000 1111 1010 -> offset
// if rs = rt then branch, so no branch

MULT: 00220018 - 000000 -> SPECIAL, 00001 -> rs, 00010 -> rt, 00 0000 0000, 011000 -> MULT


ADD $5,$2,$4 [FD] --> LW $4,0($8) [DX] 

LW:  10001101000001000000000000000000 = 8D040000
ADD: 00000000010001000010100000100000 = 00442820


sw $3,0($4) [XM] --> lw $3,0($2) [MW]     MW bypass

LW: 10001100010000110000000000000000 = 8C430000
SW: 10101100100000110000000000000000 = AC830000

lw $4,0($3) [X] --> add $3,$2,$1 [M] MX_A_1 bypass       rd,rs,rt

ADD: 00000000010000010001100000100000 = 00411820
LW:  10001100011001000000000000000000 = 8C640000

lw $4,0($3) [X] --> add $3,$2,$1 [W] WX_A_2 bypass

ADD: 00000000010000010001100000100000 = 00411820
NOP: 00000000000000000000000000000000 = 00000000
LW:  10001100011001000000000000000000 = 8C640000

add $4,$2,$3 [X] --> add $3,$2,$1 [W] WX_B_2_bypass

ADD: 00000000010000010001100000100000 = 00411820
NOP: 00000000000000000000000000000000 = 00000000
ADD: 00000000010000110010000000100000 = 00432020

add $4,$2,$3 [X] --> add $3,$2,$1 [M] WX_B_1_bypass

ADD: 00000000010000110010000000100000 = 00432020
